features.title: Why KobKlein?

instant.title: K-Pay Instant Transfers
instant.description: Send and receive money in real-time. KobKlein to KobKlein transfers are instant and free under $500.

security.title: Bank-Grade Security
security.description: Advanced encryption, fraud prevention by design, and OTP step-up verification for high-value transactions.

global.title: K-Link Global Network
global.description: Connect with the Haitian diaspora worldwide. Miami, Montreal, Paris to Port-au-Prince — instant money transfers.

card.title: K-Card Virtual Card
card.description: Shop Netflix, Amazon, and more with your KobKlein wallet. Coming soon for verified accounts.

lowFees.title: Lowest Fees Guaranteed
lowFees.description: K-Pay transfers are free. International remittances at just $1.99. Beat Western Union, MoneyGram, and the rest.

kcode.title: K-Code & K-Scan
kcode.description: Share a 6-digit rotating code or QR to receive money. No phone number needed. Safe and private.

step1.label: STEP 01
step1.title: Download the App

step2.label: STEP 02
step2.title: Create an Account
step2.description: Simple sign-up with just your phone number. Verify to unlock higher limits.

step3.label: STEP 03
step3.title: Add Funds
step3.description: Top up via local K-Agent distributor, bank transfer, or from family abroad.

step4.label: STEP 04
step4.title: Start Paying
step4.description: Send, receive, and pay merchants instantly. Use K-Card for online shopping.

kcard.subtitle: For the first time, Haitians can buy online anywhere
kcard.description: Netflix, Amazon, Spotify, and more — all powered by your KobKlein wallet. Virtual Visa card for verified accounts. Physical card coming soon.
kcard.waitlistDescription: Be first in line for the physical K-Card.
kcard.joined: You're on the list! We'll notify you.
kcard.faq: For international online purchases, KobKlein provides a supported billing address for all K-Card holders. Your purchases are funded directly from your KobKlein wallet.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: Empowering Haiti's Future
mission.description: KobKlein was built to empower Haitians with a modern, cashless payment system. Too many remain unbanked, unable to access global remittances or digital finance. We are changing that with a platform that is inclusive, transparent, and community-owned.

trust.title: Trust
trust.description: Transparency and accountability in every transaction.

accessibility.title: Accessibility
accessibility.description: Inclusive services for Haitians everywhere, banked or unbanked.

security.title: Security
security.description: Bank-grade encryption and fraud prevention by design.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Modern digital tools tailored for Haiti's future economy.

vision.title: Looking Ahead
vision.description: KobKlein is more than payments — it's a movement toward financial independence for Haiti. Our vision is to scale across the Caribbean and diaspora, connecting families, empowering merchants, and giving Haitians everywhere the tools they deserve in the global economy.

operational.description: Meeting industry best practices for operational risk management and business continuity.
